# Compile external libraries
add_definitions(
        -DTW_STATIC
        -DTW_NO_LIB_PRAGMA
        -DTW_NO_DIRECT3D
        -DGLEW_STATIC
        -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
)

### GLFW #####
add_subdirectory(glfw-3.3.3)

include_directories(
        glfw-3.3.3/include/GLFW/
)

### GLAD ###
add_subdirectory(glad)

include_directories(
        glad/include/glad/
)

### GLM ###
add_subdirectory(glm)

include_directories(
        glm/
)
